Stroll through the enchanting streets of Dubrovnik, where gleaming marble lanes, terracotta rooftops, and pristine beaches create a postcard-perfect setting. In Salerno, explore the medieval old town before venturing into the scenic countryside for a tasting of locally crafted olive oils. Experience the vibrant charm of Livorno, with its lively cafés and seaside atmosphere—or opt for a day trip through Tuscany to marvel at the Leaning Tower of Pisa and the architectural wonders of Florence’s Piazza del Duomo. Finally, uncover the timeless art of pearl-making in Palma de Mallorca, and perhaps pick up a radiant keepsake to remember your journey.
